title: GripTight Auto Vent Clip XL From Joby - Quickly and Discreetly Attach Your Large Cellphone To The Vents In Any Car
features: A compact & discrete mounting solution for a smartphone between 2.7-3.9in (69-99mm) wide
Low-profile design in your car: Lightweight, yet durable profile for discrete set-up on your air vent.
Comes with removable GripTight smartphone mount: Mount connects to JOBY GorillaPods and other tripods via the stainless steel 1⁄4"-20 thread.
Mount your phone vertically or horizontally: A positioning ball allows you to adjust the orientation and change your angle with ±20 degrees of movement.
BONUS airplane clip adapter: When traveling by plane, you can use the airplane clip adapter to mount on the closed tray table.
description: This cellphone air vent clip for large phones provides a compact and discreet dash mounting solution for the most popular makes and models. Lightweight, yet durable the Grip Tight Auto Vent Clip XL provides easy use and high functionality. Make navigation a breeze by keeping your phone hands free, yet positioned where you can easily and safely view your route. The positioning ball allows you to quickly change from portrait (vertically) to landscape (horizontally) and vise versa. With no need for a suction cup or adhesive, you can adjust your phone's location or store the vent clip when not in use, without having to worry about a sticky residue or wring mark. Made to last, your phone will stay tight and secure even after repeated daily use. You can also remove the Grip Tight Mount and attach it to any Gorilla Pod, or other tripod via the stainless steel 1/4 "-20 thread. As a bonus feature, use the airplane clip adapter to mount you phone on a closed tray table. With multi functionality, easy to use operations, and the durability to not wear out, the Grip Tight Auto Vent Clip XL is a must have! Get yours today.
